p: As seedling establishment is a first important criterion for successful agriculture, maintenance of crop yield and quality is the second one. The application of MF on irrigation water in agriculture is an important method with positive effects on physiological and biochemical aspects in different plants. A stimulation of growth and development has been evidenced in various phenological plant stages [ 199]. Currently there are various theories and hypotheses on the mode of action of this physical agent on plant growth and development [ 202, 203, 204, 205].
